DataElement.preferredName: CoPaQ Medication Not Reimbursed Out of Pocket Payment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No indicator of whether patient paid out-of-pocket for their medication that was not reimbursed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cost for Patients Questionnaire Medication Negation Reimbursement Out of Pocket Payment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess an individual's expenses as a result of their state of health. It includes questions about out-of-pocket costs, time required for travel or for booking medical services, and loss of income.:A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._A payback for out-of-pocket expenses._A payment made from personal funds.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess an individual's expenses as a result of their state of health. It includes questions about out-of-pocket costs, time required for travel or for booking medical services, and loss of income.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to assess an individual's expenses as a result of their state of health. It includes questions about out-of-pocket costs, time required for travel or for booking medical services, and loss of income.

Property.preferredName: Medication Negation Reimbursement Out of Pocket Payment
Property.preferredDefinition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._A payback for out-of-pocket expenses._A payment made from personal funds.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
A payment made from personal funds.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did you pay any portion "out-of-pocket" for your prescribed medication that was not reimbursed?
